title: INsmh
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Dietician says 'make this food swap to lower risk of diabetes and bowel cancer'
items.description: The British Heart Foundation's senior dietitian explained how the diet swap could help to improve health

items.title: 'I refused to give up my extra plane seat for a toddler - but I had good reason'
items.description: A woman has shared how she refused to give up her plane seat so an almost two-year-old boy could sit down on a flight - and people agree she was right...

items.title: Shop owner makes 50 citizen’s arrests because shoplifting at his store is so bad
items.description: Martin Gaunt fights back against retail crime through unexpected method

items.title: ‘Mosh pit nappy’ released to help people avoid long queues for the loo at gigs
items.description: It comes after a number of incidents of fans refusing to leave the pit at shows...under any circumstances.

items.title: North Korea has an embassy in the UK and it's well-hidden on a residential road
items.description: North Korea's embassy in the UK is not easy to spot, but it's been hidden in plain sight for nearly 20 years - and here's what it looks like inside

items.title: Chicken gets her own hi-vis jacket to help cross the road
items.description: Billie used to follow kids to school.

items.title: Builders pour concrete over newly built bus stand and now nobody can use it
items.description: People are working out how to sit properly on the submerged seats.

items.title: UK snow maps show huge Arctic blast set to batter millions of Brits on New Year's Day
items.description: Advanced weather modelling maps suggest the UK will be engulfed by snow on New Year's Day, with several major cities set to welcome the white stuff

items.title: Exact size of a 'sliver' of cake as Brits told to never ask for one
items.description: A new survey has revealed what Brits really mean when they use phrases like 'small slice', 'a little piece', 'a sliver', 'a tiny piece', 'a taste' and...

items.title: Cop resigns after moonlighting as porn star to pay $500,000 bills
